DESCRIPTION: Cards with 'Invest X' cost X gold to play.
#ySheltered enemies give #yGold, up to a maximum of 100. NL Sheltered increases to a maximum of #b10. NL For each stack above #b5, #ySheltered enemies gain #b1 #yStrength per turn.
#yRenting is required to make enemies #yHoused. NL Enemy is considered #ySheltered.
Make sure the first element in NAMES has no underscores. The rest should use _ in the place of spaces. In card text, you'll use the underscore versions.
If this enemy loses ALL of its Block, it gets Stunned.
